channel.title: {317} duelarena rule changing name
channel.description:
HI GUYS IM TRYING TO CHANGE DUEL ARENA RULE {FUN WEAPONS} TO {Whip / DDs} im a 100% coder i did ask alot of ppl and coder's no one can do at how can i change fun weapons to Whip / DDs i tried like 1000 time's and couldn,t make at
at is a 317 source and client wish you help me soon
pLEASE HELP NEED THIS ALOT :palm:

item.title: {317} duelarena rule changing name
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:4, topic:536989”]Okay buddy shut up if you are a 100% coder you wouldn’t be asking this.

Find the line id of the text and use your sendFrame126 method.[/quote]
If anyone wants it, it’s 669:

[2:02:16 PM] sleman ktesh ▄︻̷̿┻̿═━一☠: the text [2:02:18 PM] sleman ktesh ▄︻̷̿┻̿═━一☠: fun weapons [2:02:19 PM] sleman ktesh ▄︻̷̿┻̿═━一☠: to [2:02:19 PM] Sk8rdude: See, HUGE difference [2:02:23 PM] sleman ktesh ▄︻̷̿┻̿═━一☠: whip / dds [2:02:33 PM] sleman ktesh ▄︻̷̿┻̿═━一☠: :D [2:02:39 PM] sleman ktesh ▄︻̷̿┻̿═━一☠: so can you help [2:03:04 PM] Sk8rdude: c.getPA().sendFrame126("Whip/DDs", 669); [2:03:08 PM] Sk8rdude: Should do the trick.

Read full topic

item.title: {317} duelarena rule changing name
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“sleman, post:1, topic:536989”]HI GUYS IM TRYING TO CHANGE DUEL ARENA RULE {FUN WEAPONS} TO {Whip / DDs} im a 100% coder
i did ask alot of ppl and coder’s no one can do at how can i change fun weapons to Whip / DDs i tried like 1000 time’s and couldn,t make at

at is a 317 source and client wish you help me soon

pLEASE HELP NEED THIS ALOT :palm:[/quote]
Wat?

I think you mean you want to change what weapons are considered fun and not…
If you have a 317 PI, it’d be in config.java, there’s an array called something like “FUN_WEAPONS” and has a bunch of id’s in it. change/remove/add ints in there.

Read full topic
